WELCOME_MESSAGE:
Hi üëã, I'm Vocabulary Bot.

With my help, You can collect your unknown words and repeat their knowledge regularly.
HELP_MESSAGE:
Vocabulary Bot Help

/start - to start the bot
/help - get help message
/settings - configure the bot settings
/cancel - cancel command executing
ECHO_MESSAGE: Sorry, I don't know what to say 🙄

HELP.help_question_whatis: Vocabulary Bot - is your own different languages vocabulary with the achievements and rating system.
HELP.help_question_howto: To manage your Vocabulary you can use appropriate keyboard commands accompanied by help messages.
HELP.help_question_common: To support us you can donate to one of our wallets any amount.

DICTIONARY.EMPTY_DICTIONARY: Your dictionary is empty. Start collecting words now.
DICTIONARY.NOT_FOUND: Unfortunately, word not found in your dictionary

PROFILE.REFERRAL_LINK_TEXT: Your referral link to invite new users and get some bonuses

MAILINGS.NEW: Send me one text message, that would be used for broadcast to bot users

RATING.NOT_AVAILABLE: Vocabulary Bot Rating currently unavailable. Keep waiting for it, while the number of users increases.

THROTTLING.LANG_SETTINGS: The interface language can be changed only once per minute.

ADD_WORD.WELCOME_TEXT: Send me a new word in the next message
ADD_WORD.TRANSLATE_TEXT: Ok. Now send me a translation of a new word in the next message
ADD_WORD.SUCCESSFUL_ADDED: New word successfully added to your dictionary
ADD_WORD.NOT_VALID: Word should contain only English letters. Try again
ADD_WORD.IN_DEVELOPING: Add word command is in developing...
